name: Cities Service Oil Company v. Union Real Estate Company, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Cities Service Oil Co. v. Union Real Estate Co.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Cities Service Oil Company v. Union Real Estate Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

opinions.text:
Concurring Opinion by
Mr. Justice Cohen :
I would clarify the decree so that it would not he necessary to refer to the testimony to determine the extent of its application and the activities restrained.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Cohen :

attorneys: Charles M. Grimstad, with him J. N. Poffinberger, Jr., and Kirkpatrick, Pomeroy, Lockhart and Johnson, for appellant. .
J. Craig Kuhn, with him Arnold D. Wilner, and Wilner, Wilner and Kuhn, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Cities Service Oil Company v. Union Real Estate Company, Appellant.
Argued October 11, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
November 23, 1965:
reargument refused February 15, 1966.
Charles M. Grimstad, with him J. N. Poffinberger, Jr., and Kirkpatrick, Pomeroy, Lockhart and Johnson, for appellant. .
David R. Levin, for appellants.
J. Craig Kuhn, with him Arnold D. Wilner, and Wilner, Wilner and Kuhn, for appellees.
